entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW, FREEZING RAIN AND SLEET AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

FREEZING RAIN, SNOW AND SLEET LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN, FREEZING RAIN, SNOW AND SLEET IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, FREEZING RAIN, SNOW AND SLEET LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN, SNOW AND SLEET AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
